dcterms:creator: P. Bergmann
M. Fauser
D. Sattlegger
C. Steger
dcterms:description: MVTec AD is the most widely used dataset for industrial image anomaly detection, comprising 15 categories of items with a collection of 1725 normal and abnormal photos, as well as a total of 3629 normal images as a training set. The resolution of each image ranges from 700×700 to 1024×1024 pixels.
dcterms:title: MVTec AD

dcterms:creator: Y. Zou
J. Jeong
L. Pemula
D. Zhang
O. Dabeer
dcterms:description: VisA is the largest dataset for real-world industrial anomaly detection with pixel-level annotations, divided into twelve categories. It contains 9,621 normal samples and 1,200 abnormal samples in 10,821 images, featuring both structural and surface problems.
dcterms:title: VisA
